mapper.select: SELECT health_dic_no AS no, health , CAST(ROUND(((met * (3.5 * NVL(bodyInfo.weight,70) * #{minute}))/1000 * 5)) AS SIGNED INTEGER) AS calorie FROM tb_health_dic LEFT JOIN tb_body_info bodyInfo ON bodyInfo.member_no = #{member_no}

SELECT dic.health_dic_no AS no, dic.health, bookmark.health_bookmark_no , CAST(ROUND(((met * (3.5 * NVL(bodyInfo.weight,70) * #{minute}))/1000 * 5)) AS SIGNED INTEGER) AS calorie FROM tb_health_dic dic LEFT JOIN tb_health_bookmark bookmark ON dic.health_dic_no = bookmark.health_dic_no LEFT JOIN tb_body_info bodyInfo ON bodyInfo.member_no = #{member_no} WHERE bookmark.member_no = #{member_no}
AND health LIKE '%${healthName}%'
